original_title: The Doctors: The William Hartnell Years
overview: This is the definitive set of interviews with the team of actors who brought the William Hartnell era of Doctor Who to life! Together with a special tribute to William Hartnell (the Second Doctor), containing messages from a host of stars and production staff from Doctor Who, this also features the best in-depth interviews ever undertaken with, Carole Ann Ford (Susan), Jacqueline Hill (Barbara), William Russell (Ian), Peter Purves (Steven) and Jackie Lane (Dodo)!
tagline: Meet the stars from TVâ€™s top Science Fiction series!
title: The Doctors: The William Hartnell Years
